entry.title: Then He Kiss'd Me
entry.summary:
Author: Alwhisker

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,610Chapters: 9/20Kudos: 198

Summary: .... - "I didn’t need a glorified spandex ad to come to my aid" Wayne's tone was glowering and slightly breathless as he wiped the blood off his chin, looking over to the caped man who’d been covered in dust and rain, clark was taken aback, but remained his composure, it wasn't time to bicker with billionaires just yet. "you're welcome" he muttered, floating up to look over the crowd, he watched as the officers surrounded Bruce Wayne, EMT's checking over his wounds as the criminals were carted away into padded cars, flashing lights of cameras clicking around the scene. but clark could only focus on the man wiping his bleeding lip, effortlessly drawing him in, among the thousands of voices in his mind, only one stood out.only one."Alfred, I promise you I am fine, I- no, my leg’s fine, Grayson. Damian, stop."Clark found himself grinning, soft enough that he didn't notice it at first, but the clicks of cameras and flashing lights woke him up from his daydream, the wind under his chin was getting colder, Gotham's air was gentle on his skin, despite the smog in the air and the scent of blood that somehow always lingered, no matter how much they scrubbed down the streets.

entry.title: Conner Wayne doesn’t sound so bad
entry.summary:
Author: PurpleButterfly19

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 116,045Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 972

Summary: Superman doesn’t want to be a father to Superboy and decides to send the boy away But Batman is having none of it and does the only logical thing…..brings Superboy to Gotham and introduced him to his family So how will Clark react when he wants to find his son so he can apologize, and finds out his son has been adopted by Bruce Wayne? Oh, and apparently his name is Conner now! Featuring: ClarkxBruce, TimxConner, DickxKori, and JasonxRoy

entry.title: Notes and Observations
entry.summary:
Author: mediaraiz

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,887Chapters: 11/13Kudos: 234

Summary: We work. Superman listens when he should, and when he doesn’t, it’s because lives are in the balance. I don’t have to like his methods. I don’t have to like him. But if the League stands, it’s because he chooses to believe in it first. It works. For now.Or: Bruce Wayne’s journals trace thirteen years of rebuilding — through loss and recovery, through family and failure, and through the one constant presence Bruce records but never names for what it is: Clark Kent.

entry.title: I dont wanna fall in love (this world is only gonna break your heart)
entry.summary:
Author: soundsoftheunspoken

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,135Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 25

Summary: Bruce Wayne never believed he was meant to love—not the way normal people do. His life is harsh, unfair, and anyone he lets close is bound to get hurt. Falling in love was never part of the plan; even less now, with a child under his care. But everything shifts when one of the Daily Planet’s best reporters enters his life.Meanwhile, Batman rejects every attempt from Superman to help, keeping him far away from his city. Clark Kent never expected to fall for another vigilante. It’s weirc to love someone whose face he doesn’t even know… and weirder still when that someone seems to despise him Then Batman steps into the picture.And to make things even more complicated, Clark must do his job: interview Gotham’s prince.   or love square type of superbat fic, theyre idiots, superman loves batman, and bruce wayne loves clark kent

Author: Garfimini

Summary: Clark (37) is overworked, underpaid and drinking too much coffee for an alien. Bruce (25) is younger, going through an emo crisis and still fiding time to save Gotham. Between staying alive, boring meetings, pretending to not know each other, they find themselves entangled in a relationship both thrilling and terrifying. It's incredible, fulfilling and Clark feels like he is 18 again while Bruce learns what is real intimacy. But what happens when they realize they don't expect the same thing from this arrangement ? Time to find out. Oh and they read the Odyssey.

entry.title: When Darkness Meets the Light
entry.summary:
Author: YairPL

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,751Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 12

Summary: One year after donning the cowl, Bruce Wayne is no hero. Batman is a specter of vengeance and fury, an unstable project channeling the trauma of a child still screaming in an alleyway. His mission is a self-destructive obsession, and Gotham, a black hole deserving to be purged with fire. Clark Kent, on the other hand, bears the weight of a power he believes he owes to the universe. His invincibility is not a gift, but a shield that must stand before all the pain of others, a cosmic guilt that drives him to save even those who do not want to be saved. When the Daily Planet reporter is assigned to cover Bruce Wayne's charity gala, a clash of ideologies tears away both their masks. Clark sees the deep open wound behind the playboy. Bruce feels for the first time truly seen. This is the story of how light does not always blind the darkness; sometimes, it sits beside it in silence and offers to heal its wounds. It is the journey of two men meeting at the precipice: one learning to be a hero, and the other learning to be human. And from the fragile bridge of understanding they build, the legend will be born.

entry.title: The Protection Agreement
entry.summary:
Author: Nacrestack

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,655Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 128

Summary: Superman has finally had enough. It has been far too long for him to not reveal his identity. When he commits to outing himself to the JL he'll have to contend with the ever cautious Batman. Little does Clark know, Batman isn't nearly as opposed as he seems and Batman might have a secret of his own to share. Too bad everything goes wrong as soon as Batman starts to open up. First it's the media frenzy, then Batman's weird behavior, then Bruce Wayne's ridiculous antics and finally a dangerous villainous plot. Clark is sure he'll never learn more about his best friend after this giant mess.
